# tree-sitter-po-orchard

[![crates][crates]](https://crates.io/crates/tree-sitter-po-orchard)
[![pypi][pypi]](https://pypi.org/project/tree-sitter-po-orchard)

[GNU gettext translation file (PO/POT)](https://www.gnu.org/software/gettext/manual/html_node/PO-Files.html)
grammar for Tree-sitter, forked from https://github.com/tree-sitter-grammars/tree-sitter-po

Note that unlike upstream, generated files are not checked into git, so you need to run `tree-sitter generate` after cloning this repository.

Contributions are welcome, so are co-maintainers.

[crates]: https://img.shields.io/crates/v/tree-sitter-po-orchard?logo=rust
[pypi]: https://img.shields.io/pypi/v/tree-sitter-po-orchard?logo=pypi&logoColor=ffd242
